data.title: Earth Day Fairfax
data.meta_description: Fairfax County, Virginia - Welcome to Fairfax County’s 2023 Earth Day Festival!  The Largest Earth Day Celebration in Fairfax County!
data.text:
Thank you! The 2024 Fairfax County Earth Day Festival was a smashing success with thousands of residents in attendance for an amazing day of fun! As you remember the fantastic experience of our 2024 event with the video and photos below, mark your calendar for the 2025 Earth Day Festival:

Saturday, April 19, 2025

at the Sully Historic Site

3650 Historic Sully Way, Chantilly, VA

The Fairfax County Park Foundation, a 501(c)(3), supports the Fairfax County Park Authority by raising private funds, obtaining grants, and creating partnerships that supplement tax dollars to meet our community’s needs for park land, facilities, and services. Visit the Park Foundation website or call them at 703-324-8582.
